infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select and crop profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to save cropped profile pictures to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone for video recording features.
